Classes                  Data Without Borders: Data Science in the Service of Humanity                                                     The agency of decay quantifies a person\'s life. It shows people when they will die. By making the quantification of spent time and remaining time clear, the interactive data visualization gives agency to persons to accomplish the things that matter to them. In addition to the quantitative experience, a qualitative measurement/indicator can be produced as output.
